text: Philip Lonicer (Philippus Lonicerus) (died 1599) was a German historian. Lonicer produced a Latin version of the Gesta Danorum in 1576, entitled Danica Historia Libris XVI. He was also the rector of the Frankfurt Gymnasium. Category:German historians Category:1599 deaths Category:Year of birth unknown Category:German male non-fiction writers
title: Philip Lonicer
